mapper.select: select filter,MEMBER_ID,EMAIL,PW,NAME,NICKNAME,TEL,ADDR,ADDRESS,STATUS,REG_DT,MOD_DT,sum_price from (select rownum filter, m.MEMBER_ID,m.EMAIL,m.PW,m.NAME,m.NICKNAME,m.TEL,m.ADDR,m.ADDRESS,m.STATUS,m.REG_DT,m.MOD_DT,s.sum_price from MEMBER m, sum_order s where m.member_id = s.member_id order by MEMBER_ID) where filter between #{StartNum} and #{endNum}

select filter,MEMBER_ID,EMAIL,PW,NAME,NICKNAME,TEL,ADDR,ADDRESS,STATUS,REG_DT,MOD_DT from(select rownum filter, MEMBER_ID,EMAIL,PW,NAME,NICKNAME,TEL,ADDR,ADDRESS,STATUS,REG_DT,MOD_DT from MEMBER where MEMBER_ID like '%' || #{keyword} || '%' order by MEMBER_ID) where filter between #{StartNum} and #{endNum}
select count(*) cnt from MEMBER where MEMBER_ID like '%' || #{keyword} || '%'

select m.member_id,m.email,m.pw,m.name,m.nickname,m.tel,m.addr,m.address,m.status,m.reg_dt,m.mod_dt,s.sum_price from member m, sum_order s where m.member_id=#{member_id,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and m.member_id=s.member_id
